text: 13.11: Kis 9.3; 1 Sml 5.6; FG 9.8Ndu mbarara! Fhe Bakɨmen farve ntigem ndu thɨgɨrga, ndun rɨmani ntige mpɨrarga. Ndu maaŋ muuŋgip tuga mpeeŋnera kegɨrga, ndu ran ŋaara gangirga fhuvara.” Por nen Erimas ga nzuavra thagim, buiva phɨgage gɨngɨngi fara muuŋgi bigɨna mbe vhemkora zav, Erimas rɨmani vharigi. Mba bigɨna phɨgage zav, ana vharigim, ana fhura tamtam vuav, won harar suirav tuavar wo khɨvɨrga guma ga nzuav nzuai.
